```{r load libraries}
library(neuralnet)

```

### 11.3 Toyota Corolla

```{r load the data}
toyota <- read.csv("data/ToyotaCorolla.csv")

toyota <- fastDummies::dummy_cols(toyota, select_columns = "Fuel_Type")

toyota.range <-

toyota.nn <- neuralnet(formula = Price ~ Age_08_04 + KM + Fuel_Type_Diesel + Fuel_Type_Petrol + Fuel_Type_CNG + HP + Automatic + Doors + Quarterly_Tax + Mfr_Guarantee + Guarantee_Period + Airco + Automatic_airco + CD_Player + Powered_Windows + Sport_Model + Tow_Bar, data = toyota, hidden = 2, linear.output = T)
```
